message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,250,000.  It's a great deal for both of us - a fair price for you, and a good starting point for me. Let me know what you think!

Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the suggestion, but I believe we can find a price that works better for both of us. I am willing to pay $1,100,000 for your product. I hope this proposal is acceptable.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer. While I value your interest, $1,100,000 doesn't quite meet my needs. I'm willing to come down to $1,150,000.  This is a fair compromise and still represents a good deal for both of us. Let's make this happen!

Alice, thank you for your counteroffer. I understand your position, but I am still looking to keep the price closer to my initial budget. I am willing to pay $1,125,000 for your product. I hope this proposal is more in line with your expectations.
